arts.ttl: Lukaku on Skipping International Duties, Conte and More
arts.sum: Romelu Lukaku stayed in Naples for the second consecutive break to work on his conditioning. Coach Domenico Tedesco stated that the striker motivated his choice with the fact that he didn't have a proper pre-season preparation. arts.ttl: Luciano Spalletti Blasts Self-Destructive Italy After Belgium Stalemate
arts.sum: Italy head coach Luciano Spalletti addressed the media following a stomach-wrenching 2-2 home draw against Belgium. Gli Azzurri threw away a two-goal cushion to drop points for the first time in the 2024/25 UEFA Nations League cycle. arts.ttl: Italy vs Belgium 2-2: Suicidal Azzurri Squander Double Lead
arts.sum: An Italy lineup with suicidal tendencies dilapidated a two-goal lead on Thursday night as they were held to a tie by Belgium in the third matchday of the Nations League. But they showed once again that they are well on track toward redemption after the summer Euro-disaster. arts.ttl: Italy Player Ratings vs Belgium: Pellegrini Wrecks Brilliant Azzurri Display
arts.sum: Andrea Cambiaso put the Azzurri ahead after two minutes, while Mateo Retegui confirmed their dominance with another strike. However, the hosts' brilliant work was undone by Lorenzo Pellegrini who got himself sent off for a tackle from behind late in the first half.
